<title level="1" right="Trait">[Concealable](/Traits.aspx?ID=327)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

This weapon is designed to be inconspicuous or easily concealed. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks and DCs to hide or conceal a weapon with this trait.
name: Concealable
